c1.name: Infallible Procession
c1.descriptionRaw: Each time Dahlia gains 1 of his Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Radiant Psalter</color>'s Benison stacks, he will regain 2.5 Elemental Energy.
c1.description: Each time Dahlia gains 1 of his Elemental Burst Radiant Psalter's Benison stacks, he will regain 2.5 Elemental Energy.

c2.name: Revelation of Mercy
c2.descriptionRaw: After Dahlia consumes his Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Radiant Psalter</color>'s Benison stacks to summon a Shield of Sacred Favor, the character protected by said Shield will gain 25% increased Shield Strength for 12s.
c2.description: After Dahlia consumes his Elemental Burst Radiant Psalter's Benison stacks to summon a Shield of Sacred Favor, the character protected by said Shield will gain 25% increased Shield Strength for 12s.

c3.name: Windblume Offertory
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Radiant Psalter</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Radiant Psalter by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Collect of the Assembly
c4.descriptionRaw: The Favonian Favor from Dahlia's Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Radiant Psalter</color> lasts 3 more seconds.
c4.description: The Favonian Favor from Dahlia's Elemental Burst Radiant Psalter lasts 3 more seconds.

c5.name: Let It Be Subtly So
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Immersive Ordinance</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Immersive Ordinance by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: You Shall Go Out With Joy
c6.descriptionRaw:
The current active character affected by the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Radiant Psalter</color>'s Favonian Favor has their ATK SPD increased by 10%.
Additionally, when an active character affected by Favonian Favor falls, immediately:
路 Revive them.
路 Restore their HP to 100%.
This effect can trigger once every 15 minutes.
